certifications.title: Cybersecurity Roles, Processes & Operating System Security

publications.title: Advanced Machine Learning Techniques in Cybersecurity Applications
publications.journal: IEEE International Conference on Computer Science and Technology
publications.abstract: This paper explores the application of advanced machine learning techniques in cybersecurity, focusing on anomaly detection and threat prediction systems.

publications.title: Blockchain Technology Integration in Modern Web Applications
publications.abstract: An exploration of blockchain integration strategies for modern web applications, focusing on security, scalability, and user experience improvements.

publications.title: AI-Driven Code Review: Enhancing Software Quality Through Machine Learning
publications.abstract: This research presents a novel approach to automated code review using machine learning algorithms to improve software quality and development efficiency.
